paper_abstract: This paper introduces a new algorithm for computing SAGBI-Graner bases for ideals of invariant rings of permutation groups. This algorithm is based on F-4 algorithm. A first implementation of this algorithm has been made in SAGE and MAPLE computer algebra systems and has been successfully tried on a number of examples. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: F-4-invariant algorithm for computing SAGBI-Grobner bases
